alert.note: Alert for Avery; Burke Mountains; Caldwell Mountains; McDowell Mountains; Mitchell; Yancey (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 30 at 9:34PM EDT until May 01 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Avery, Yancey, Mitchell, Caldwell Mountains, Burke Mountains and McDowell Mountains Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered showers will occur from time to time as well. The showers could briefly mix down stronger wind gusts to the surface. Downed trees and scattered power outages will be possible where this occurs.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Avery; Burke Mountains; Caldwell Mountains; McDowell Mountains; Mitchell; Yancey
